parameter.title: Background Window Size
parameter.abstract: Background Window Size: The window size in pixels for computing local mean backscatter level.

parameter.title: Threshold Shift
parameter.abstract: Threshold Shift (dB): The detecting threshold is lower than the local mean backscatter level by this amount.

parameter.title: Minimum Cluster Size
parameter.abstract: The minimum cluster size in square kilometer. Cluster with size smaller than this size is eliminated.

parameter.title: WKT Polygon for the Region of Interest
parameter.abstract: Set the value of WKT Polygon
